sqlMap.statement: SELECT ARSC.AR_STMT_DT FROM AR_STMT_CTRL ARSC ,AR_STMT_ISS_CYCLE ASIC WHERE ASIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ASIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ASIC.AR_STMT_ISS_ACTV_FLG = #actvFlgY# AND ASIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ARSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ASIC.AR_STMT_ISS_CYCLE_CD = ARSC.AR_STMT_ISS_CYCLE_CD AND ARSC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ARSC.AR_STMT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - ASIC.AR_DAYS_PRI_STMT_CRAT_NUM, 'YYYYMMDD') = #arAcctDt# AND ARSC.AR_STMT_STS_CD = #arStmtStsCd# AND ARSC.LATE_FEE_FNLZ_FLG = #lateFeeFnlzFlgN#
